Text:
Audiophiles may not want this version.  It's very compressed.  The original version had dynamics that this one doesn't.  If you just like it really loud this version is for you.

Track 11 is not on the original though.
No, the audio quality is perfect. Absolutely perfect. There is a pedal effect used in a few places that I could see some one mistaking for compression artifacts, but that's all it is.

Yes, audio quality is perfect.  I was talking about audio compression, not data compression.  There is no loss with FLAC (hence the name Free Lossless Audio Compression).  Since I posted my first comment I found this to better explain what I was talking about:
http://forum.nin.com/bb/read.php?62,1176452
Many THANKS for the up!! And I really do wish the record companies would stop remastering albums that clearly don't need it!!
